NPINV.CO.summary: Npinvestor.com A/S, a technology and finance company, operates in the investment industry serving private investors, investment companies, and financial institutions in Denmark. It offers its proprietary online trading platform, Straticator, from which investors trade stocks, indices, commodities, and currencies through their mobile phone, tablet, and computer. The company also operates an investor portal, www.NPinvestor.dk, which publishes financial news, stock prices and analyzes, etc. of listed companies. Npinvestor.com A/S is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.
